webServer.command: npm run build && npm run preview -- --host 127.0.0.1

specs.title: should show proper content structure without JavaScript

stdout.text:
Content without JavaScript: 
      
        
          VODER
        
      

      
        
          
            
            Keep Shipping Fast
            
              Stop AI from turning your codebase into an unmaintainable mess. AI development that
              stays clean and scales with your team.
            
            
              Coming Soon
            
          

          
            Sound Familiar?
            
              
                You started using AI to ship faster, but now your codebase looks like it was written
                by a caffeinated intern having a breakdown.
              
              
                
                  üìÅ
                  Empty .md files everywhere because AI "documented" your features
                
                
                  üîß
                  Scripts that work once, then break mysteriously in production
                
                
                  üèóÔ∏è
                  Architecture that made sense to GPT but confuses every human

                  Debugging takes longer than writing the original code
